original_text: These things are being taken figuratively: The women represent two covenants. One covenant is from Mount Sinai and bears children who are to be slaves: This is Hagar.
korean_text: 이것은 비유니 이 여자들은 두 언약이라 하나는 시내 산으로부터 종을 낳은 자니 곧 하갈이라

sentences.original_text: These things are being taken figuratively:
One covenant is from Mount Sinai
sentences.korean_translation: 한 언약은 시내 산에서 온 것이며

sentences.original_text: and bears children who are to be slaves:
